item.title: Terraform - Spotify Automation
item.description: Overview Manipulating spotify playlist using Terraform, because why not? Check out all of the configuration files on GitHub at the repository. I have various examples of Terraform using the Spotify Provider within as well! Understanding the provider For all Spotify API usage with Terraform, You must either run a oauth server locally and just provide the API key, or use something online and provide all 4 necessary features (api, token_id, user, and oauth_url).
